Message Settings

[id://512013] has two parts:

Message (Inbox) Settings

These settings control displaying of private messages sent to you from other PerlMonks users.

  • /msg me when there's a reply to one of my posts: if you select this option, the server will put a message in your [id://48824] whenever someone replies directly to one of your posts.

  • Newest messages first: this setting controls whether newest or oldest messages will be listed on top of the list.

  • Max to display in inbox: sets the number of private messages to show per page in the inbox.

  • Max to display in chatterbox sets the number of private messages to show in the chatterbox. If there are more messages a link to your inbox will be shown that contains the number of additional messages.

Folder Settings

This lets you manage archive folders for [id://48824|private messages]. Folders can be created and renamed, but not deleted.
